description:
The plush softness of fleece is a welcome layer of warmth on a cool morning or a shaded campsite. It has the Patagonia signature stand-up collar to top the 4-snap placket. Contrast binding at sleeve openings and hem help hold in warmth.Made of soft 100% polyester fleece.Placket is 92% recycled nylon, 8% nylon, with DWR finish.Spandex binding at sleeve opening and hem.Fair Trade Certified sewn.Regular fit.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade














                      Recycled content
name: Patagonia Micro D Snap-T Pullover - Girls' - Youths
